name: vsphere_managed_inventory_definition
label: vSphere Managed Inventory Definition
description: vSphere Managed Inventory Objects that are used in virtual machine creation.

attributes.name: vsphere_datacenter
attributes.description: The name of a Datacenter in which to create the Virtual Machine and other assets.
attributes.label: vSphere Datacenter Name

attributes.name: vsphere_resource_pool
attributes.description: Name of the default resource pool for the cluster. Must be specified as 'cluster_name/resource_pool'
attributes.label: vSphere Resource Pool Name

attributes.name: vm_folder
attributes.description: vSphere Folder name to create the Virtual Machine.
attributes.label: Virtual Machine Folder Name

attributes.name: vm_image_template
attributes.description: Virtual machine Image template name. If it is in a folder then include folder name as follows 'folder_name/image_template_name'
attributes.label: Virtual Machine Image Template Name

attributes.name: vsphere_adapter_type
attributes.description: Network adapter type for vNIC Configuration
attributes.label: vSphere Network Adapter Type

attributes.name: dns_servers
attributes.description: A list of DNS servers to add on the virtual machine.
attributes.label: DNS Servers

attributes.name: dns_suffixes
attributes.description: A list of DNS search domains to add to the DNS configuration on the virtual machine.
attributes.label: DNS Suffixes

attributes.name: vsphere_vm_ipv4_gateway
attributes.description: IPv4 Gateway Address for network customization on the virtual machine.
attributes.label: IPv4 Gateway
attributes.regexdesc: Provide a Valid IP address for the Virtual Machine Gateway

attributes.name: vsphere_vm_ipv4_netmask
attributes.description: Integer value between 1 and 32 for the prefix length (CIDR) to use when statically assigning an IPv4 address
attributes.label: IPv4 Netmask (CIDR)
attributes.regexdesc: Provide an integer value between 1 and 32
